text: George Richard Moscone (November 24, 1929 â€“ November 27, 1978) was an American lawyer and politician. He served the mayor of San Francisco from 1976 through 1978. He was a member of the Democratic Party. ==Early life== George Richard Moscone was born on November 24, 1929 in San Francisco, California.Sward, Susan, Moscone's Time Was Anything But Quiet, November 26, 1998 He studied at St. Ignatius College Preparatory and at University of the Pacific. ==Personal life== Moscone was married to Gina Bodanza until his death. He had 4 children. ==Death== On November 27, 1978, he and Harvey Milk were shot and killed by Dan White in San Francisco City Hall. White committed suicide seven years later. ==In popular culture== In the 2008 movie Milk, he was played by Victor Garber. ==References== ==Other websites== *George Moscone at Findagrave *Controversial commissioned bust of George Moscone by Robert Arneson Category:1929 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Assassinated American politicians Category:Mayors of San Francisco Category:Murders by firearm in the United States Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: George Moscone
